tool_description: Selfhost a whin instance, a Whatsapp API REST client. Send or receive notifications with your very own number.
name: mywhin
title: mywhin

api_list.name: list groups
api_list.description: get a list of all groups you are a participant, and their group-id (a.k.a. gid). Watch this [video](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=HDM_l33691M) showing how to do it.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://mywhin.p.rapidapi.com/grpall"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "mywhin.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://mywhin.p.rapidapi.com/grpall"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "mywhin.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: which is my webhook
api_list.description: the response will be the url defined as webhook destination where the whatsapp messages will be delivered. Watch a how to [video](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=8WyG_becZXM).
api_list.code:

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "mywhin.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: resume
api_list.description: switch the tenant from `sleep` to `active` state.

        }

api_list.name: unenroll
api_list.description: A request to this endpoint will wipe your instance, it will transition to `pending enrollment` state. You'll need to enroll using a new QR to continue using the service.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://mywhin.p.rapidapi.com/kill"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "mywhin.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: enroll
api_list.description: This endpoint returns a QR **after 15 seconds**; it must be scanned from the whatsapp app installed on a phone.
api_list.code:

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "mywhin.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: status
api_list.description: Returns the status of your tenant. Possible values are: ``active``, ``sleep``, ``pending enrollment``.

print(response.json())

api_list.name: create
api_list.description: This endpoint will create a dedicated instance that will be linked to your rapidapi username.

            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "mywhin.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: private listener url
api_list.description: The response is an url that you have to use as a webhook destination at the origin service. The content sent to it will be routed as a message to any whatsapp number or to a whatsapp group of the user.

optional_parameters.name: destination
optional_parameters.description: This param can either be a group-id or a whatsapp number. The payload received from the Origin will be parsed and sent as a whatsapp message to the destination set here.
optional_parameters.default: enter a group-id or a whatsapp number

api_list.name: get receiver
api_list.description: This endpoint shall be triggered by origin services, it's **NOT** to be used on the playground.

api_list.name: get group invite link

required_parameters.name: gid
required_parameters.description: enter the group-id of the group you want to obtain an invitation link.

api_list.name: leave group

required_parameters.name: gid
required_parameters.description: enter here the valid group-id of the group you want to leave.

api_list.name: refresh group invite link
api_list.description: revokes previous invitation link, and creates a new one

required_parameters.name: gid
required_parameters.description: enter the group-id of the group you want to revoke previous invitation links, and obtain a new link.
